ygData.subject: Roleplaying
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have a character, Wadkira, on Rodcet Knife and joined the Mystic Alliance a while back.  Unfortunately, I haven t played EQ in a while.  I ve heard much
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I have a character, Wadkira, on Rodcet Knife and joined the Mystic Alliance
a while back. Unfortunately, I haven't played EQ in a while. I've heard
much about Role Playing servers and was curious about them.

One of the reasons I haven't played much, is that EQ feels a little to hack
and slash to me, with the monsters generally tending to have most of the
fun hacking and slashing (Wadkira dies way too often).

Online Gaming appealed to me because you're playing with other people.
Let's face it, if I want to play by myself, I can play Might and Magic.

How would role playing work in EQ. I'd be interested in ways to gain
experience by interacting with other PC's. Would guilds be given certain
Experience Points that they can set up for use in Guild Quests? Could
individuals give away a portion of their experience as a trade for an item?
(Or would that last one just be misused).

With me falling dead every 15 minutes, I don't really get to advance very
far and it's hard to find others to group with at my level (12 I think).
And stop telling me to go to Blackburrow. I *hate* it there. But if
interacting with other players, both interpersonally and as part of the
game, was a larger focus, I might enjoy myself more.
